org.alljoyn.bus

Class ProxyBusObject

  • Object
    • ProxyBusObject

  • public class ProxyBusObject
extends Object
    A bus object that exists and is managed by some other connection to the bus. Use ProxyBusObject to call methods on remote objects.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • release

        public void release()
        Release resources immediately. Normally, when all references are removed to a given object, the Java garbage collector notices the fact that the object is no longer required and will destory it. This can happen at the garbage collector's leisure an so any resources held by the object will not be released until "some time later" after the object is no longer needed. Often, in test programs, we cycle through many BusAttachments in a very short time, and if we rely on the garbage collector to clean up, we can fairly quickly run out of scarce underlying resources -- especially file descriptors. We provide an explicity release() method to allow test programs to release the underlying resources immediately. The garbage collector will still call finalize, but the resrouces held by the underlying C++ objects will go away immediately. It is a programming error to call another method on the ProxyBusObject after the release() method has been called.

      • getBusName

        public String getBusName()
        Gets the bus name.
        Returns:
        the bus name

      • getObjPath

        public String getObjPath()
        Gets the object path.

      • getInterface

        public <T> T getInterface(Class<T> intf)
        Gets a proxy to an interface of this remote bus object.
        Parameters:
        intf - one of the interfaces supplied when the proxy bus object was created
        Returns:
        the proxy implementing the interface
        See Also:
        BusAttachment.getProxyBusObject(String, String, int, Class[])

      • setReplyTimeout

        public void setReplyTimeout(int timeoutMsecs)
        Sets the reply timeout for method invocations on this remote bus object. This affects all future method invocations of this bus object. The default reply timeout is 25 seconds.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMsecs - the timeout to wait for a reply

      • setAutoStart

        public void setAutoStart(boolean autoStart)
        Tells the bus to start an application to handle a method invocation of this bus object if needed. This affects all future method invocations of this bus object. The default behavior is to not start an application.
        Parameters:
        autoStart - if true the bus should automatically start an application to handle the method

      • isSecure

        public boolean isSecure()
        Indicates if the remote object for this proxy bus object is secure.
        Returns:
        true if the object is secure

      • getProperty

        public <T> Variant getProperty(Class<T> iface,
                      String propertyName)
                    throws BusException
        Get a property from an interface on the remote object.
        Parameters:
        iface - the interface that the property exists on
        propertyName - the name of the property
        Returns:
        Variant containing the value of the property
        Throws:
        BusException - if the named property doesn't exist

      • setProperty

        public <T> void setProperty(Class<T> iface,
                   String propertyName,
                   Variant value)
                 throws BusException
        Set a property on an interface on the remote object.
        Parameters:
        iface - the interface that the property exists on
        propertyName - the name of the property
        value - the value for the property
        Throws:
        BusException - if the named property doesn't exist or cannot be set

      • getAllProperties

        public <T> Map<String,Variant> getAllProperties(Class<T> iface)
                                     throws BusException
        Get all properties from an interface on the remote object.
        Parameters:
        iface - the interface
        Returns:
        a Map of name/value associations
        Throws:
        BusException - if request cannot be honored
